"Killing Time on Naberius":
"You're probably wondering about client
requests, how they work and stuff like that.
I've got some time to kill, so let's practice
a little, shall we? I'll make sure it's a
simple request. And don't worry, there's
gonna be a reward, too. I mean, it
wouldn't be much of a client request
without one, would it?"

"クライアントオーダーをやるための手順とか
仕組みとか、よくわかってないだろ？
ちょうど時間もあるし、練習してみようぜ。
簡単な依頼にしておくからよ。

もちろん、報酬もきちんと用意してあるぜ。
雰囲気はしっかり出さないと、だもんな。"
